data.name: Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches: You Mustn't Kiss Her, Okay?
data.short_description: "Keep this a secret from Shiraishi!" Just as Yamada decides to keep the fact his kiss' power has changed to "Charm" a secret from Urara, she urges him to switch bodies. He'd better go see Odagiri Nene and get his power back to normal in a hurry! Elsewhere, Nene is irritated that Yamada hasn't ...

English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
